Uses of Package
uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui

  • Packages that use uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data  
    uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui  
  • Classes in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui used by uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data 
    Class and Description
    DataManager
    DataManager class which does all the transfer of data and calling of methods between classes
  • Classes in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui used by uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.gui 
    Class and Description
    DataManager
    DataManager class which does all the transfer of data and calling of methods between classes
    ItemPanel
    ItemPanel class which inherits from JPanel holds several arrayList, button and List objects to show the different Menus and passing data on to the Order and OrderPanel using the DataManager class and it methods
    ItemPanel.AddItem
    inner class that implements ActionListener reacts when the "Add" button is pressed pass data about the selected object to the DataManager class
    ItemPanel.LoadDrinksMenu
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Drink" button is pressed calls the loadDrinkMenu() method
    ItemPanel.LoadPizzaMenu
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Pizza" button is pressed calls the loadPizzaMenu() method
    ItemPanel.LoadSidesMenu
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Sides" button is pressed calls the loadSidesMeny() method
    ItemPanel.SizeButtonListener
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts to changes on the JRadioButtons
    MainFrame
    MainFrame class which inherits from JFrame get's created in the main() method of the Main() class creates the Mainframe, ItemPanel, OrderPanel and DataManager
    Menu
    Menu class which creates the Menu for the MainFrame
    Menu.NewTillListener
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the newTill object get clicked in the Menu calls newOrder() method in DataManger class
    Menu.Quit
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the close object get clicked in the Menu Terminates the program
    OrderPanel
    OrderPanel class which inherits from JPanel holds an JList, JTextField, Button and ArrayList to processing the "basket"
    OrderPanel.PayButtonListener
    inner class which implements ActionListener reacts when the "Pay" button gets clicked creates frames which MessageDialogs when certain requirements are not fulfilled like the Customer name has not been sat
